definitions.definition: Without feeling or consciousness; deprived of sensation
definitions.example: The blow to his head rendered him senseless, he didn't awaken until he was in the ambulance.

definitions.definition: Lacking meaning or purpose; without common sense
definitions.example: What a senseless waste of money.

definitions.definition: Without consideration, awareness or sound judgement
definitions.example: He took senseless risks, not even aware of the danger he was in.
